message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this deal and we can both enjoy our gains.
Alice, let's be real. I'm feeling generous today, so here's a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, but remember the clock is ticking (and the value is dropping!).
Bob, that last offer was absurd. This is my final offer - take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains even further.
Alice, it seems we're at an impasse. Let's stop wasting time and split the difference closer to your last offer.  This is my final offer.
